problem.markdown:
>>1. Who discovered that all human being fall into four principal blood groups according to their compositions?<< ( ) Mendal (x) Landsteiner ( ) William Harvey ( ) Spancer
>>2. BB , BO genotype belongs to which phenotypes?<< ( ) O ( ) A (x) B ( ) AB
>>3. Genotype combinations are __ in numbers.<< ( ) 4 ( ) 3 ( ) 5 (x) 6
>>4. The heredity of blood group is fully known?<< (x) True ( ) False
>>5. AA and AO genotype belongs to which phenotypes?<< ( ) O (x) A ( ) B ( ) AB
>>6. What is Erythrocytes?<< ( ) WBC ( ) blood platelets (x) RBC ( ) none
>>7. The plasma is a coagulable fluid, containing a variety of substances like fibrinogen<< (x) True ( ) False
>>8. What is leukocytes?<< (x) WBC ( ) blood platelets ( ) RBC ( ) none
>>9. Blood also help in removing the waste products of metabolic activities.<< (x) True ( ) False
>>10. The allelic genes which can occupy the same locus on a certain chromosome are not responsible for hereditary mechanism.<< ( ) True (x) False
